participant_1.background:
I like to do spontaneous things on the weekend, like go for walks in the woods at midnight.
i like to drink at bars with friends.
I enjoy a cheeseburger once in a while, but I make sure to get in my daily exercise to stay fit.
I had to sell my motorcycle to pay for my car.
i am fluent in spanish.

participant_2.background:
I am not the fittest person, but I run to stay healthy for my baby.
i am a soccer mom.
i love art.
I have a laptop that allows me to easily share my travel pictures and stories with others.
My adoptive parents were amazed when I played twinkle twinkle little star with my armpit.

content.text: Hey there! I am good, how are you doing?
I am doing well, thank you!
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to run and I am a soccer mom. I also love art.
Oh that is cool! I like to run too, but I am not the fittest person.
You are doing better than me! I can only run to stay healthy for my baby.
That is a good reason! I am sure your baby is very happy to have you as a mom.
Thank you! I love being a mom.
What kind of art do you like to do?
I like to paint and draw. I also like to make jewelry.
That is cool! I like to paint too.
Oh that is awesome! We should paint together sometime.
That would be fun! I would love to do that.
